siteMetadata.head: Welcome to Fix Pics
siteMetadata.title: we restore your memory
siteMetadata.block1: Remember those old cameras and pictures that you printed and use to show everyone in nicely crafted albums ?
siteMetadata.block2: When last time you looked into those? When last time you showed old pictures to others ?
siteMetadata.block3: But how many times you wanted to show those but thought it may just not worth the hassle of bringing those heavy albums and most likely being humiliated because of faded out quality of pictures stored in dark for years ?
